article_title: FACT CHECK: Koster doesn't exaggerate income threshold to qualify for Medicaid
article_text:
Columbia, MO (65201)

Today

Cloudy early with scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 77F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , politifact, chris koster, medicaid, income, kaiser family foundation, missouri legislature
article_metadata.author: Katie Moeller/Politifact Missouri

og.description: Missouri Attorney General Chris Koster, a Democratic gubernatorial candidate, recently tweeted: “A single mother of two can’t qualify for basic healthcare through Medicaid if she makes more than $3,504 dollars
